LanguageData.Chicken.label: ニワトリ
LanguageData.Chicken.description: もっとも伝統的な家禽です,鶏から,卵と肉が採れます.
LanguageData.Meat_Chicken.label: ニワトリの肉
LanguageData.Meat_Chicken.description: 生の切り分けられた食用肉.生のままでも,調理して料理にしても,食べることができます.とても成長が速く,よく卵を産みます.
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.claws.label: 爪
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.beak.label: 嘴
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.head.label: 頭部
LanguageData.Pig.label: ブタ
LanguageData.Pig.description: ブタは,人によって飼い馴らされた最初の動物の一つでした.豚からは,一般に肉と皮が採れます,そして肉でも野菜でも食べるので育てるのは簡単です.ブタは性質的に利己的ですが,複雑な仕事を訓練することはできます.
LanguageData.Meat_Pig.label: ブタ肉
LanguageData.Meat_Pig.description: 生の切り分けられた食用肉.生のままでも,調理して料理にしても,食べることができます.
LanguageData.Pig.tools.head.label: 頭部
LanguageData.Cow.label: ウシ
LanguageData.Cow.description: 飼い慣らされた,大きな有蹄動物で,ウシは,多くの牛乳,肉,革を産むように数千年も品種改良されてきました.かれらは,ことのほか穏やかな生き物で,復讐しようとはしませんし,どれほど傷つけられても気にしません.ほとんど彼らは農場生活に適応しており,野性では生きていけません.
LanguageData.Meat_Cow.label: ウシの肉
LanguageData.Meat_Cow.description: 生の切り分けられた食用肉.生のままでも,調理して料理にしても,食べることができます.
LanguageData.Cow.tools.head.label: 頭部
LanguageData.Cow.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Cow.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Alpaca.label: アルパカ
LanguageData.Alpaca.description: ラマと近縁の中型有蹄類です,アルパカは,並外れて柔らかくて熱を通さない毛をとるために飼育されています.アルパカはまた,駄載獣としても使われています.古代南アメリカのゴツゴツした山岳地帯で荷物を運んでいました.
LanguageData.Meat_Alpaca.label: アルパカの肉
LanguageData.Meat_Alpaca.description: 生の切り分けられた食用肉.生のままでも,調理して料理にしても,食べることができます.
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.head.label: 頭部
LanguageData.Duck.label: カモ
LanguageData.Duck.description: A very common type of farm bird, also appearing in the wild, the duck is raised for its delicious meat. It grows quick but lays eggs quite rarily.
LanguageData.Duck.tools.claws.label: 爪
LanguageData.Duck.tools.beak.label: 嘴
LanguageData.Duck.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Bison.label: バイソン
LanguageData.Bison.description: A large plant eating mammal appearing in the savannah wilderness. Tamed are quite docile, but enraged are fast and dangerous.
LanguageData.Bison.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Bison.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Bison.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Goat.label: ヤギ
LanguageData.Goat.description: Naturally curious about the world, goats are among the friendliest domesticated creature bred by mankind.
LanguageData.Goat.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Goose.label: ガチョウ
LanguageData.Goose.description: A domesticated bird kept by humans as poultry for it's eggs and meat. Lays eggs very often, however they take a long time to hatch.
LanguageData.Goose.tools.claws.label: 爪
LanguageData.Goose.tools.beak.label: 嘴
LanguageData.Goose.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Sheep.label: ヒツジ
LanguageData.Sheep.description: Sheep husbandry is practised throughout the majority of the inhabited worlds, however only recently it has been introduced to the rimworlds. Domestic sheep are relatively small herbivores, usually with yellowish wool and medium sized horns.
LanguageData.Sheep.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Sheep.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Sheep.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Horse.label: ウマ
LanguageData.Horse.description: A large hoofed mammal with a short coat, a long mane, and a long tail. Horses have been domesticated since ancient times.
LanguageData.Horse.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Horse.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Horse.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Yak.label: ヤク
LanguageData.Yak.description: Yaks are robust cattle with a bulky frame, short but thick legs, and rounded cloven hooves that are splayed to help them walk in snow.
LanguageData.Yak.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Yak.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Yak.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.GuineaPig.label: モルモット
LanguageData.GuineaPig.description: Neither a pig or a creature from Guinea, these little rodents are bred to be a household pet and a delicious dinner.
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.left_claw.label: 左爪
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.right_claw.label: 右爪
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Donkey.label: ロバ
LanguageData.Donkey.description: A small relative of the horse, domesticated in ancient times for farm work. Its goofy call is simultaneously annoying and endearing.
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.head.label: 頭
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.left_hoof.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.right_hoof.label: 右蹄
